author: striker
msg: Add the diff-test and diff3-test wrappers to the workspace.

author: philip
msg: Fix a problem with 'svn diff -rREV' for a property only change.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c (close_file): Only run external diff if
a temporary file has been created.

author: rassilon
msg: For issue #1003: This completes the fix for #1003 by completing the test
code changes, and schema changes discussed for this fix. i.e. Adding a
committed-path to the NodeRevision table, and removing the path column
* subversion/libsvn_fs/structure (Change table): Remove PATH as a column
in order to pass the change_path into fold_change.
svn_fs__parse_change_skel): Adjust the skel parsing for the schema
(svn_fs__change_t): Remove the path member since this is no longer
needed given the new svn_fs__dag_get_committed_path API.
lazy_copies_created_rev): Adjust svn_create_error callsites due to
transactions starting at 1 to reflect behavior with normal FS
API calls instead of via direct table manipulation.
that uses FS API function calls as opposed to direct table
(changes_fetch): Modify test case to use new FS APIs that test the
new schema change by calling add_standard_fs_changes.

author: kfogel
msg: For issue #689: Have the delta library compare checksums after
completing a delta application, and have the working copy pass the
expected checksum through during updates.  Note that no comparision
will actually happen yet, however, because the working copy update
editor is still receiving a null expected checksum from its driver.
* subversion/include/svn_delta.h: Fix typo in the text delta overview.
(struct apply_baton): Add new md5_context, result_checksum fields.
(svn_txdelta_apply): Take new result_checksum argument, stash it in
the apply_baton, and initialize the baton's md5_context.
(apply_window): Update the md5_context when processing a window;
finalize and compare checksums when handling the last window.
(apply_textdelta): Compare base_checksum with text base's checksum.
(txn_body_apply_textdelta): Pass NULL as expected checksum to
(apply_textdelta): Pass NULL as expected checksum to svn_texdelta_apply.
(apply_textdelta): Pass NULL as expected checksum to svn_texdelta_apply.

author: cmpilato
msg: (apply_textdelta): Update to latest editor interface semantics.
